name: White Princes Fashion Doll
details: This Barbie Fashion Doll comes with stylish clothes and accessories.

name: Mermaid Alive Doll
details: The Baby Alive Doll can eat, drink, and wet its diaper, providing a realistic play experience.

details: The American Girl Doll is a high-quality collectible doll with a wide range of accessories and outfits.
